Class DebuggerTags

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.truffle.api.debug.DebuggerTags
public final class DebuggerTags extends Object
Set of debugger-specific tags. Language should provide an implementation of these tags in order to support specific debugging features.
Since:
0.14

    final class 
    DebuggerTags.AlwaysHalt
    Marks program locations where debugger should always halt like if on a breakpoint.
